name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Operations Engineer with 13+ years of experience in managing and optimizing server infrastructures and data centers. Proficient in **Linux**, **Networking**, **Troubleshooting**, and **Server Administration**, ensuring seamless operations and high availability. Strong expertise in **Kubernetes** for orchestration and managing containerized applications, with skills in **Scripting** to automate routine tasks.
Experienced in implementing monitoring solutions with **Grafana** and **Prometheus**, providing real-time insights into system performance and reliability. Demonstrates exceptional documentation skills and thrives in **Team Collaboration** environments to enhance operational efficiency.
Additionally, has a solid background as a Full Stack Developer, skilled in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Familiar with deploying applications on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing microservices architecture.
